component.name: Standalone Server Setup
component.description: Express setup for standalone server configuration. It installs Portal, Enterprise, and Server components on the same server and configures FuseCP using sample settings.

component.name: Portal
component.description: FuseCP Portal is a user interface to the control panel which allows managing user accounts, hosting spaces, web sites, FTP accounts, files, etc.

component.name: Enterprise Server
component.description: Enterprise Server is the core of FuseCP system. It includes all business logic of the application. Enterprise Server should have access to Server and be accessible from Portal applications.

component.name: Server asp.net v4.5
component.description: FuseCP Server is a set of services running on the remote server to be controlled. Server application should be reachable from Enterprise Server one.

component.name: Server asp.net v2.0
component.description: FuseCP Server asp.net 2.0 is a FuseCP Server module for Exchange 2010. It has limited functionality mainly aimed to support software that can not run on asp.net 4.5 (like exchange 2010).

component.name: Cloud Storage Portal
component.description: FuseCP Cloud Storage Portal is a client frontend for viewing and editing their Cloud (WebDav) storage files.
